Description: Two ring-shaped beads, both made of faience, one is much better preserved with well made reddish-grey glazing. The latter one has a sharp edge. One disc-shaped bead made of ostrich eggshell.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D12.1, lowest level
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
